name: Yashik
description: You play for an unusual character. You must pass challenging puzzles. How to? By creating your own platforms! Some platforms are bouncy, some can move. But you only get a few. Use them wisely, player.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP (SP 2,3), Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128 mb Storage: 128 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP (SP 2,3), Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128 mb Storage: 128 MB available space
